original_text: And he was driven from the sons of men; and his heart was made like the beasts, and his dwelling was with the wild asses: they fed him with grass like oxen, and his body was wet with the dew of heaven; till he knew that the most high God ruled in the kingdom of men, and that he appointeth over it whomsoever he will.
korean_text: 사람 중에서 쫓겨나서 그의 마음이 들짐승의 마음과 같았고 또 들나귀와 함께 살며 또 소처럼 풀을 먹으며 그의 몸이 하늘 이슬에 젖었으며 지극히 높으신 하나님이 사람 나라를 다스리시며 자기의 뜻대로 누구든지 그 자리에 세우시는 줄을 알기에 이르렀나이다

sentences.original_text: And he was driven from the sons of men
and his heart was made like the beasts
and his dwelling was with the wild asses
they fed him with grass like oxen
and his body was wet with the dew of heaven
till he knew that the most high God ruled in the kingdom of men
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 가장 높으신 하나님이 사람의 나라에서 다스리심을 알기까지니

sentences.original_text: and that he appointeth over it whomsoever he will
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 원하는 자를 그 위에 세우심을 깨달았더라
